Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aparthotel Puerto Azul in Marbella (Marbella Seafront Promenade), you'll be minutes from Fontanilla Beach and close to Marbella Marina. This beach aparthotel is within close proximity of Venus Beach and Orange Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 61 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and refrigerators, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the aparthotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the aparthotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Aparthotel Puerto Azul in Marbella (Marbella Seafront Promenade), you'll be minutes from Fontanilla Beach and close to Marbella Marina. This beach aparthotel is within close proximity of Venus Beach and Orange Square.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fontanilla Beach - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Marbella Marina - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Venus Beach - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Orange Square - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Museo del Grabado - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Bajadilla Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Museo del Bonsai - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Marbella Theatre - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Marina La Bajadilla - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Plaza de Toros Marbella - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
La Dama de Noche Golf Course - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Funny Beach - 3.3 km / 2 mi
El Corte Ingles Shopping Center - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Puerto Banus Marina - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Centro Plaza - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Puerto Azul is Malaga (AGP) - 40.5 km / 25.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Puerto Azul is Malaga (AGP) - 40.6 km / 25.2 mi.
